name: io.github.microck.discord-py-self-mcp
description: Comprehensive Discord selfbot MCP server for full user autonomy. Interact with Discord DMs, servers, channels, and UI elements through your AI assistant.

environmentVariables.name: DISCORD_TOKEN
environmentVariables.description: Your Discord user account token. Required for the selfbot to authenticate.

environmentVariables.name: CAPTCHA_PROXY
environmentVariables.description: Optional proxy URL for solving hCaptcha challenges.
